channel.title: About on Justin C Yang
channel.description: Recent content in About on Justin C Yang

item.title: Publications
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE) library(knitr) library(scholar) library(dplyr) library(kableExtra) yang <- "o-MsbBYAAAAJ" pubs_1 <- get_publications(yang) pubs_1 %>% knitr::kable(format = "html")
